landing.transformHome: Transform your home into a thriving plant paradise with our intelligent monitoring system and personalized care recommendations.

landing.testimonialDescription: Hear what our community is saying about how PlantSmart has transformed their plant care experience.

landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of plant lovers who've already made their plants happier and healthier with PlantSmart.

features.smartWateringDesc: Our sensors monitor soil moisture and automatically water your plants at the perfect time, ensuring they're never over or under-watered.
features.description: Smart watering schedules tailored to each plant
features.lightOptimizationDesc: Track light exposure throughout the day and receive recommendations on optimal placement for each of your plants' specific needs.
features.healthAlertsDesc: Get instant notifications about potential health issues, pests, or diseases before they become serious problems.
features.dashboard: Beautiful dashboard across all your devices

footer.tagline: The future of intelligent plant care. Never let your plants suffer again.

testimonials.heading: Don't just take our word for it. See what our community of plant lovers has to say about their PlantSmart experience.

testimonial1.quote: PlantSmart completely transformed my plant care routine. I used to kill every plant I touched, but now my apartment is a thriving jungle! The AI recommendations are incredibly accurate.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.quote: As a busy entrepreneur, I never had time for proper plant care. The automated watering system is a game-changer. My plants have never looked better, and I get peace of mind.
testimonial2.name: Marcus Rodriguez

testimonial3.quote: The health alerts saved my fiddle leaf fig from a pest infestation I never would have caught early. The mobile app makes monitoring so convenient and actually fun!
testimonial3.name: Emily Watson

devices.manage: Monitor and manage your connected devices

premium.scheduleDescription: Schedule automatic watering, get detailed analytics, and more with Premium.
premium.unlockDescription: Take your plant care to the next level with advanced features, detailed analytics, and premium support.
premium.faq1: How does the Premium subscription work?
premium.faqAnswer1: When you upgrade to Premium, you'll immediately gain access to all premium features. You can choose between monthly or annual billing. Annual billing saves you 20% compared to monthly payments.
premium.faq2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
premium.faqAnswer2: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. Your access to premium features will continue until the end of your current billing period. We don't offer refunds for partial subscription periods.
premium.faq3: What happens to my data if I downgrade to Basic?
premium.faqAnswer3: If you downgrade from Premium to Basic, you'll still have access to your core plant data, but premium features will be disabled. Historical data beyond 30 days will be archived but not deleted, so if you upgrade again later, you can regain access to it.
premium.faq4: Is there a limit to how many plants I can add with Premium?
premium.faqAnswer4: No, Premium subscribers can add unlimited plants to their account. This is compared to the Basic plan, which allows up to 5 plants.
premium.readyToUpgrade: Ready to upgrade your plant care?
premium.ctaDescription: Join thousands of plant enthusiasts who have transformed their plant care routine with PlantSmart Premium.
premium.ultimateDesc: Everything Premium has + AI intelligence & real-time monitoring
premium.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Get detailed insights into your plant's health over time with comprehensive data visualization and trend analysis.
premium.automatedSchedulesDesc: Create smart watering schedules tailored to each plant's needs, with automatic adjustments based on real-time sensor data.
premium.aiRecommendationsDesc: Receive personalized care recommendations from our AI system, which learns from your plants' specific conditions and growth patterns.
premium.customZonesDesc: Organize plants into custom zones based on location, type, or care requirements to streamline monitoring and management.
premium.dataExportDesc: Export your plant data in various formats, including CSV and PDF, for record-keeping or further analysis.
premium.prioritySupportDesc: Get priority access to our support team with faster response times and dedicated assistance for any issues.
premium.activeSubscriptionDescription: You can extend your subscription or upgrade to a different plan at any time.
